column4: synaptics->packet sources. there is a tab with lists the keys
Yes, that's the screen I'm looking at.  But which key do I add here?  If I go into "Passwords and Encryption Keys", and export the public key to my PGP signature, is that what I use?
i think so. if you used this key to sign your packages

Yes, I'm fairly sure this is the one I used.  I just tried adding it to the Software Sources, and it appears to have accepted it.  I'll have to upload a new package to actually see if it works.  Thanks for the help.
